description: Program type available in the region: A=Program A, B=Program B, C=control, i.e. no program. This indicates the program offer/availability in the region, not participation. All households in the same region have the same program_type.
Type of retrofit implemented: 0=none, 1=insulation only, 2=windows only, 3=heating only, 4=combination of multiple types of retrofits.
Monthly energy consumption (kWh) - average over the year
Monthly energy costs (EUR) - average over the year
Average indoor temperature during winter months (Celsius)
Number of health issues related to cold/humidity (respiratory problems, etc.) in past year
Years of education of household head
